localities.comment: Coordinates from Wikipedia. The cited source only says 'Vaud, Switzerland'. For Col du Marchairuz specifically, I cited an article I no longer have access to: Helversen, O. von. 2004. Myotis alcathoe v. Helversen und Heller, 2001 – Nymphenfledermaus. Pp. 1159–1167 in Niethammer, J. and Krapp, F. (eds.). Handbuch der Säugetiere Europas, Volume 4: Fledertiere, Part II: Chiroptera II (Vespertilionidae 2, Molossidae, Nycteridae). Wiebelsheim, Germany: Aula-Verlag, pp. x + 605–1186 (in German). ISBN 3-89104-639-1
